CSIRT - Manager and technical at Advens
France
Summary
Passionate about my work and a voracious appetite for security,
I also test many solutions to develop recognized skills in
Cybersecurity.
Projects are as varied as the security issues faced by our clients: risk
analysis, architecture studies, system hardening, user awareness,
support for security projects, penetration testing, design of secure
architectures, business continuity plans, PKI, etc.
Experience
Advens
4 years 9 months
CSIRT - First level manager and technical 
January 2019 - Present  (1 year 9 months)
Région de Paris, France
Responsible for the creation of a CSIRT, I am in the first level manager team.
We organize the activity, define the services, the tools and the scope.
In operation, we qualify customer requests, we will recruit the incident
response team in our internal skills and we adapt the reaction to the incident.
Certifications passed :
Cybereason Certified Technical Specialist
Cybereason Certified Security Expert
Cybereason Certified Threat Hunter
training followed :
ENISA European Union Agency For Cybersecurity
SANS - 401 Security Essential
SANS - 503 Intrusion Detection
SANS - 508 Advanced Incident Response and Threat Hunting
SANS - 660 Advanced Penetration Testing, Exploit Writing and Ethical
Hacking
  Page 1 of 7
   
CyberSecurity Senior Specialist
January 2018 - Present  (2 years 9 months)
Paris Area, France
Dedicated to the DIRISI (direction interarmées des réseaux d'infrastructure
et des systèmes d'informations de la défense) market for SOC activities and
hardening of systems of the Ministry of the french Army. Trained in regulations
on the French Military Programming Law and Vital French organizations, my
main missions are :
- Understand the security issues in relation to cyber risks,
- Analyze architectures
- Identify or imagine best way of threat detection,
- Manage multi-skill teams (pentesters, analysts, technicals and auditers),
- Follow the different phases of the projects, in a supervisory role, or in a
contributor role,
- Contribute to innovation and development of detection technics.
Training followed :
Deep Knowledge in MITRE ATT&CK
Advanced Training on SPLUNK
Training Securing industrial networks
Training  Deep Inspection Packet 
Offensive Security Training: Cracking the perimeter CTP
Deceptive Security Training
Nessus Scanner Training
SOC Solution Integration Manager 
January 2017 - February 2018  (1 year 2 months)
Région de Lille, France
I was in charge of customer SOC's integration : Sec architecture, Sec Log and
SOC exploitation. 
Team leader of three experts in order to cover perimeter.
As part of a team specialising in responding to security incidents (CSIRT),
I supported our teams in optimising the operational security policy on our
customers' infrastructures. I intervened for the Advens SOC and put my
expertise to work for our clients and internal teams. I was involved in the
configuration of the technologies managed and supervised by our Security
Operated Center.
My main missions were:
- Supporting our teams in the deployment of mySoc services to our clients,
  Page 2 of 7
   
Assist in the qualification and resolution of security incidents,
- Maintain or upgrade information system architectures and configurations to
adapt them to 
monitoring plans,
- Perform configuration and logging policy reviews aligned with SOC Risk
analysis,
- Define the prerequisites for the deployment of mySoc services as well as the
technical integration 
procedures,
- Participate in integrations and provide support to the operating teams.(like
making full malware analysis of NotPetya and Wannacry)
- Proactive technology watch
- Model assembly for proof of concept
Self Courses follow :
Training Industrial Network Security
Training SANS 401 Security essentials
Training

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
